item.title: 10 Uncomplicated Martial Arts Movies With Tons Of Fighting
item.description: Martial arts movies with uncomplicated stories focus on high stakes and non-stop action, letting the raw energy of the fights drive them forward.

item.title: 10 Best Movies Like A Real Pain
item.description: From The Farewell to The Darjeeling Limited, there are a lot of great movies like A Real Pain to watch after Jesse Eisenberg's acclaimed dramedy.

item.title: Cillian Murphy's 28 Years Later Return Can Finally Make Up For 28 Days Later's Ending Mistake
item.description: Jim's role in 28 Years Later can make up for an alternate version of 28 Days Later's ending that was not used for the theatrical release of the movie.
